website_summaries.verdict: A metal yet lightweight sculpting wheel made for serious pottery makers.
pros: The perfect pottery wheel whether you have your own studio or not
The rubber boot means you don't have to drill the wheel into a table and at ten pounds, it's easy to move
cons: Some wheels had blemishes on the surface from the manufacturing process
May rust if it gets wet

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided tabletop
customer_reviews.text: Weight & size are good but the tabletop was not centered to the base, so it was lopsided as it spun. Not great if you want an even coat of paint/glaze etc around a piece. As others have mentioned it does stink pretty bad, though I assume that'd go away eventually. In any case, I returned it and will find another brand. I should point out that while this is from "US Art Supply", the item is marked "Made in China".
customer_reviews.author: TWS

customer_reviews.title: Great product. We have added two features that enhance ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely designed by an USA design engineer. Even the manufacturing source seemed to follows the design requirements. Great product. We have added two features that enhance our team members to do a bit more precise work. the two are: 1. Machined X and Y axis lines across the table top surface. 2. Added a brass tipped long set screw and small handle, in the base, thus controling table speed rotation and to also lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not spin freely
customer_reviews.text: This wheel does not spin freely. As soon as you put your hands on the pottery after spinning it, it stops spinning. Who can mold evenly with one hand while spinning erratically with the other hand? Go for an electric wheel instead. The spinning option is pointless on this. It's just good for detailing or glazing.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is really just a slab piece of metal that put together. There is no quality to it. It's also bare Iron. Not steel. It will rust if you put any type of water on it. Mine is rusting now after I spun some clay. **edit**. After spinning a piece once, the top plate rusted. I wiped it down etc.. After each day so spinning, I have to literally scrub it down and make sure all the clay or water is off. totally not worth the hassle. The ceramic shop (site) has literally the same product for 50% off of what it is on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: John smith

customer_reviews.title: 12" metal turntable... sculpting or glazing
customer_reviews.text: Smooth bearings... flat as measured with a level(bubble).. Only critique is the fairly rough and sharp machining on top surface. It is bare metal and if you are using it for sculpting... the extra grip on the surface might be ok... but I am going to sand and paint mine. snags a sponge but only on parts of the turnrtable. Base is heavy and should hold up. Good value for $$$
customer_reviews.author: G. BurnsteinTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy turntable
customer_reviews.text: My son has been doing ceramics at school and wanted to be able to create things at home. We got this for his birthday. It seemed like the sturdiest thing for the price, and it did not disappoint. He is very happy with it. It's heavier than expected, but that's a good thing because it stays put. And it turns easily. It seems to be exactly what he needed.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even spin!! And it rusts.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed to discover upon opening the box that this banding wheel didn't even spin! Now I am forced to send it back in the hopes they will send me a unit that DOES work properly! Update: Amazon immediately sent a replacement wheel; however, after less than two months of usage it's now rusting????
customer_reviews.author: MJ in CA

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, defect on the surface, low quality
customer_reviews.text: The product came with this defective surface which makes it hard to do pottery work. What a waist. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eti Fakiri

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginner. Like the size would prefer if the base wasn't plastic. The metal top is good quality though and it spins very smoothly so make it easier to work on my projects with ease of rotation .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased, but there's room for improvement....
customer_reviews.text: This works, but the platter could be flatter (mine has an obvious warp to it of about 0.5in). Also, my wife purchased two of these by accident and, on one of them the shaft wasn't fully inserted into the bearing (which added some wobble). However, this may be a "you get what you pay for" issue; flatter may just be harder to make and as a result cost more. So, next time I'll do a bit more shopping to see where the price break for the next class up the line is. I'm getting good use from this, but I won't be expecting to achieve perfect results.
customer_reviews.author: J. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy and works well
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy and works well, but smells like cheap black plastic form China. It contaminated my whole storage room.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana and Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Us Art Supply Large 12" Diameter Sculpting Wheel Heavy Duty All
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for granddaughter for beginning pottery she was thrilled. It does not have a motor you have to turn it by hand.It is very heavy you need a good solid base to set it on, This is a very nice wheel. I was very pleased with the purchase and I recommend .As far as durability it looks as if it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is just a no fuss turntable that is heavy enough that there is no worry about accidentally tipping it over. It turns sufficiently, but don’t expect it to stay in motion on its own. It’s not really made for giving a spin (say for painting a stripe in one continuous motion), so much as just being able to turn manually as needed. I use it for sculpture.
customer_reviews.author: K&K

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Spin Appropriately!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I thought it would spin easily for glazing. With one push I only get 1 or 1 1/2 rotation. This is a major disappointed at this price point. It's basically useless unless you need a pedestal.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great to have this tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty wheel and is a great help to hand building ceramic projects. It arrived with a scratch that is now a little rusted and I keep a close eye on it and keep it as dry as I can to avoid problems. But basically this was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jaburk

customer_reviews.title: wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I purchased this. It was packaged well, shipped quickly. Is very high quality, I love sculpting on it and even making brush on molds on top of it with silicone, so much nicer turning it around to reach all angles quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Spins superbly!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing can spin for days. Really a small push and it goes for a long time. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Frankjnm

customer_reviews.title: Was a very heavy duty table considering the price.
customer_reviews.text: My nine-year-old daughter has yet to do her first clay project on this spinning table. The spinning table is fairly heavy which is nice so that it doesn’t spin away or fall over when spun.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Altenbach

customer_reviews.title: Great tool at a perfect price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sculpting wheel, perfect amount of room underneath for your fingers, very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to 3-d scan objects of varying weight and it works really well. A solid wheel that was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wren River Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: I mean that in the most literal of senses. The thing is solid metal. Well balanced, well made, durable, gets the job done. 5/5 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Overlord

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I returned it. It did seem well made, very heavy duty but it rusted after one use.
customer_reviews.author: tibby

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for creating sculptures!!! Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: EMR

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: It works just like it should, rotates very smoothly and makes it easier to get to all sides of whatever project I am working on. It is a nice heavy solid base that doesn't wobble when turned.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Patterson

customer_reviews.title: worked great for 2 days,
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price. It worked fine for a couple of days and then quit charging.I guess Im going to have to try to find an original Dell charger and pay the Dell price.
customer_reviews.author: B Shep

customer_reviews.title: Great base for heavy projects
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Heavy duty . Rotates easy and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my acrylic pouring. This week just used it and it is awesome. It's very sturdy and spins evenly any steady and will go at a good speed for spreading paint. Very happy would purchase again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Bama girl

customer_reviews.title: Smooth free rotation, even for light objects.
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is beefy, and has a smooth low-friction rotation. I use it when applying underglaze to ceramics. Even small pieces keep rotating smoothly for along time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Zurbuchen

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s suppose to do. Durable bearings and heavily constructed
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: it's what you hope it is.
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly what your looking for if your a sculptor. it is very heavy, does not tip over, the bearings are smooth, it's pretty much the ultimate in sculpture stands. I cannot recommend this enough. It will last my lifetime surely.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Pottery Wheel
customer_reviews.text: Good weight and even spin. Will be making ceramic bowls,
customer_reviews.author: Mark Grambauer

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what i wanted. The base has ...
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what i wanted. The base has a rubber style lining that grips whatever you put it on. It spins really well. Heavy, which is exactly what I was looking for to do my sculptures on. I can't think of a down side to it.
customer_reviews.author: joshua williamson

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a banding wheel.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty banding wheel, Ms well balanced and very even.
customer_reviews.author: NDM

customer_reviews.title: heavy wheel, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Pitted, and poorly patched, cast top (alloy) of wildly varying thickness. Clumsy cheap rubber/plastic foot. Cheap rough bearings. Great for people that like to buy tools they don't use.
customer_reviews.author: potter

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter and she loves it. It's very durable and well balanced. She put it to use right away.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy weight. Works well at Daniel Zimmerman Studio as I sculpt and hand build daily.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the money, sturdy, turns easy, stays in place.
customer_reviews.text: Needed for workshop. Everyone liked, wanted mine - just the right height from bottom of base to top of wheel, making it easier on the arms, shoulder muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Pops

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing, I had no clue how sturdy this would ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, I had no clue how sturdy this would be!!! I have been recommending this to other teachers
customer_reviews.author: kimberly sherman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Paint ceramics on this and u will wish u always had this.
customer_reviews.author: Terry King

customer_reviews.title: it does have a strong smell of gasoline (i put ...
customer_reviews.text: it does have a strong smell of gasoline (i put it out side to air out all good) its awesome
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great deal great product
customer_reviews.text: Great wheel, spins perfect. Great construction, all steel, has a rubber bottom so it dosent slide. I looked around at other art suppliers online the same or comparable product was $50 or more higher in price . Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: smelled terrible and did not spin smooth and evenly. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Latkowski

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this wheel is sturdy... it made my work very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brown

customer_reviews.title: stout and heavy. a little off balance.
customer_reviews.text: stout and heavy . a little off balance. price good
customer_reviews.author: l black

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but scratched
customer_reviews.text: It seems very sturdy and sticks to the table but it came all scratched up. It looked used.
customer_reviews.author: manning413

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic banding wheel. Why pay more for a brand name? Perfect product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Simpson

customer_reviews.title: My aunt uses it every day .
customer_reviews.text: Great item we put cement item to paint on them .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good luck trying to break it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HEAVY, good luck trying to break it.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, balanced. good overall size
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came in a larger size as well, but happy with this wheel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This banding wheel is awesome! It's sturdy, weighty and glides like silk! Perfect for airbrush or for sculpting too!
customer_reviews.author: Denise R. Becknell

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, but most important, great quality! The price was most reasonable for this well made piece.
customer_reviews.author: P.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is great quality. Wheel turns with ease. Rubber bottom keeps it in place. Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dude

customer_reviews.title: obsessed
customer_reviews.text: i use this for my cake decorating! works like a champ. love it and recommend for any artists and cake decorators.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Linker

customer_reviews.title: Poor finish quality
customer_reviews.text: While functionally there is nothing wrong with this wheel, the finish on the wheel head is quite poor. The imperfections include a gouge in the center of the wheelhead as well as small pinholes in the finish. I did email the company on February 15, 2017, and have received no response. I have chosen not to return it, since it is so heavy, and I also generally have a ware board on top of the wheel head. However, it's hard to consider it of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Howard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great banding wheel! Sturdy construction yet turns smoothly. You are in control of your work all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and fluid
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for a product turntable for video shoots and have attached a motor and controller to control the speeds.
customer_reviews.author: D. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This product is sharp on hands when spun, my daughter could only use once. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tb

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED DAMAGE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received product damage, box was in good condition. The base was repaired sloppy and had already started to flake off. See pictures.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeMember2014

customer_reviews.title: it is of good quality, well built
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional sculptor however, it is of good quality, well built, abd sturdy. The size is nice, i git the 11" wheel. It also turns very smoothly and I received it in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Undulates. Unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Solid and smooth spin. Unfortunately the turntable is uneven and undulates. Unusable. I hate it when I have to return things. I live 100 miles from a UPS store, and it's a big hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Megan O Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very handy, heavy and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Great diameter turntable, and used it for several clay projects since I received this several weeks back. The initial funky plastic/weird rubber smell is still faintly in the air - but I did allow it to air out before placing it in my studio. It should disappear. It is heavy as it should be, and the head turns smoothly, evenly, without any glitches. I haven't left any wet work directly on the surface for any substancial length of time, so uncertain whether or not it will rust?? So far its just what I would expect and at a decent price point.
customer_reviews.author: research diva

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this banding wheel
customer_reviews.text: OMGoodness.....LOVE LOVE LOVE this banding wheel. I revived it as a gift from my husband. As a potter, this is a must. I have been using lazy susans that I found at the thrift store because I didn't want to pay for the banding wheel. I'm also a slab potter (ie, I don't use a pottery wheel) so it's hard to justify getting one...boy was I wrong! This is a must have for any potter. It is heavy / great weight / flawless spin.
customer_reviews.author: Clover J

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough for professional use
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional artist and I am extremely pleased with this product. Nice size, good base weight, and the bearing rotates very smoothly. Easily handles 50lbs of clay without a glitch. For the price, these are a great value. The quality is good, the base is solid, and the turntable rotates without any effort. If your expecting the same quality as a high end $250 banding (sculpting) wheel, then you should buy a $250 banding (sculpting) wheel. For under $50 I haven't found anything yet that can even compare to this. I will be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Clayguy

customer_reviews.title: It seemed sturdy and like it was smooth saili--
customer_reviews.text: I never actually got a chance to use this; my mother and I do ceramics/pottery together and I decided to finally order her one of these since she was unconvinced. A few days before her birthday (when I was going to give it to her), she bought one for herself! I *had* already taken the item out of the box and tested its quality. It seemed sturdy and like it was smooth saili--... erm, spinning. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: River Mist

customer_reviews.title: I like the weight and it spins very smoothly
customer_reviews.text: The top surface of mine was pitted severely. Appears to be a blemish created during casting. I was surprised it wouldn't be cast so that any blemishes came out on the bottom, not the top that will make it easier for clay projects to stick. Aside from that I would have kept it. I like the weight and it spins very smoothly. I returned it, but I may try to order another one to see if it has the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: MN Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Work With But Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to sculpting so really have not compared clays but this brand seems to be easy to use. I built a 15 x 15 inch, tinfoil lined box which uses a 60 watt light bulb with reflector to soften the clay (it takes 20 minutes but no more than that for an individual one pound piece). My only criticism is it is too expensive. However, Amazon's prices beat all the other clay web sites by 20 to 30% including shipping, so unless I find a more reasonable clay source I guess I'll stick with it..
customer_reviews.author: shrinkucci

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I gave this five stars earlier, and said that it had an aluminum rotor. Even better - it is cast iron, with an excellent intertia ratio. The extra weight keeps it spinning longer. It somehow is an alloy that does not rust in contact with wet clay.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Pippitt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value for banding wheel
customer_reviews.text: WOW. I was not expecting this product to be so nice! I love the weight, nice and heaving, it won't slide around when I use it. I love how smooth the wheel spins. This will replace a shorter wheel in my studio - love the extra height. I was blown away by the quality for the price. I highly recommend this product if you need a banding wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Feat of Clay

customer_reviews.title: Can double as a cake stand!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for price because it is the best price for this kind of product that I have found. Still a little pricy for me. Very smooth turning, good height, heavy and strong enough to support sculpting or ceramic work. Doubles as a good cake decorating support too!
customer_reviews.author: happyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t freely turn....not a true banding wheel.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a year ago and have struggled with it since then. It won’t turn freely making it useless as a banding wheel. I use it as a stand to work on ha d hilt pottery, but I can’t use it to decorate as with a real banding wheel. Wish I’d spent the money and gotten a Shimpoo!
customer_reviews.author: Lehua

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly sturdy and moves very smoothly. Great size too without taking up so much space and although a bit heavy, still easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Kieffer

customer_reviews.title: "SPINS FOR DAYS" NOPE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after a reviewer said it would spin for days. Well it doesn't! I'm only using it to to create acrylic pours. It spins for about 10 seconds and grinds to a halt! And the surface isn't level. It has a wobble when it spins. I'm extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: equus924

customer_reviews.title: What a great moderate size turning stand!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this thing because it goes well with current smaller projects with sculpty. I am sure it would service the bigger enterprises as well. Love the durability and ease in turning.
customer_reviews.author: Love Beauty Crystals

customer_reviews.title: Good balance, spins forever
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Good balance, spins forever. There is a tiny wobble as it spins, but for handbuilding, it's still a great deal! Much cheaper than the name-brand version that I was looking at, and I think it will still serve me well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a “used” item and couldn’t be happier. Great condition, delivered quickly and exactly what I needed in my art studio. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: awesome turn table have used it several times works great ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome turn table have used it several times works great looked for a long time bid on one from japan didn't get like this one better
customer_reviews.author: robert gardner

customer_reviews.title: Love it, very sturdy and smooth spinning
customer_reviews.text: Love it, very sturdy and smooth spinning. It will be impossible to find such size & quality in any local art stores.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar T

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles due to not being level
customer_reviews.text: This product, although near level, is not, and therefore has a significant wobble. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Staceofgrace

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the Clay Crafter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my wife who is into clay crafting. It was a better item than she had asked for and the larger wheel was what she really needed. A quality built item with a superior ball bearing rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Ron G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for home!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Bought a used one. The first time I bought this product, I only received a broken wheel without the turntable. We complained and received a full refund. Re-ordered again, and finally got the full functioning piece. It's pretty neat to finally get one of these:)
customer_reviews.author: Luis Carlos Peña Cortes

customer_reviews.title: More than a lazy susan.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized turntable for clay projects and other crafts. Very heavy and is a stable and smooth rotating surface.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.B.

customer_reviews.title: "The wheel" a must for serious artist.
customer_reviews.text: The sculpting wheel works fantastically.I'm glad I purchased it.I like that it is lightweight, and easy to move from one place to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well built turntable
customer_reviews.text: I am an amateur potter, so this works for me! It is very durable and sturdy! The turntable does not turn quickly, but it meets my needs and I probably will never have to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Jasovsky

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than expected
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this as a photo turn table and it's worked out very nicely. Does what it's meant to do...turn :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Block

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy but a little stiffer than I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but a little stiffer than I'd hoped. I may have to apply something to get it to spin a bit smoother.
customer_reviews.author: oliveforhealth

customer_reviews.title: helpful
customer_reviews.text: good quality . I use it for pottery and floral designing... makes the work go much easier and heavy enough to stay put.
customer_reviews.author: sue hobart

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Useful, I purchased it for the purpose of painting abstract art on T-Shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a surprise for my boyfriend who does sculpting as a hobby. He loved it! It's perfect for getting into those fine details (instead of using a motorized/huge wheel). Great product and a lot heavier than I thought!
customer_reviews.author: Heather D.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great solid spinner! I purchased this for painting and it's great! It so heavy duty it should last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Walters

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't sculpt without this tool
customer_reviews.text: This turntable is a must have for my ceramic projects. It turns smoothly and is a good weight to use and move around.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Cunniff

customer_reviews.title: The recipient is very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to be used for cake decorating . The recipient is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Janet V.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sculpting Turntable!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely solid and smooth turntable for sculpting! I would very much recommend this to anyone looking for a sculpting turntable! It's very quiet and sturdy. I am a longtime Amazon Prime customer who enjoys writing reviews in my free time. If you have any questions or comments about this product or my review, feel free to message me and I'll be glad to help!
customer_reviews.author: K. LeCrone

customer_reviews.title: Great to use for painting too!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy I bought this for my son. It has worked out perfect and it cleans up easy. He paints flower pots....no more finger prints on the clay pot.
customer_reviews.author: Auburn Kat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent to work with heavy enough not to move but easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Margot Wombacher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and heavyweight this unit is great for the price. Love it. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Mark House

customer_reviews.title: a fine product.
customer_reviews.text: Wish the base was a bit higher - just a personal preference. Otherwise, a fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Vaman Pai

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, strong, and I love it. It works great for my sculpting and use it all the time, it does take up space but I view it as worth it since it allows me to sculpt while keeping it in one place.
customer_reviews.author: journey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and well built
customer_reviews.text: This is how all products should be made with quality materials and quality craftsmanship
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Z

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and balanced. Quite adequate for half the price of brand name banding wheel. Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Nancy old accnt

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given five stars if it didn't have a few imperfections; nevertheless, I still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JL

product_meta.title: US Art Supply Large 12" Diameter Sculpting Wheel- Heavy Duty All Metal Construction & Turntable with Ball Bearings
product_meta.description: US Art Supply LARGE 12" Diameter Sculpting Wheel- Heavy Duty All Metal Construction & Turntable with Ball Bearings
feature_bullets: If you are a painter, sculptor or decorator working in ceramics, pottery, floral arranging, model-making, clay design, cake decorating and other artistic work you will find this wheel a perfect choice
The base and top are all high grade and heavy duty made of nearly indestructible heavy cast metal joined with a heavy-duty ball bearing that allows the top to spin easily. Holds up to 50 lbs
The base has a non-skid rubber boot that holds the wheel firmly in place without the need to drill holes in your work station
The top is designed with concentric circles to allow easy centering of your work and the rim is weighted to give the wheel extra momentum when you spin it

It is tall enough for you to get your hand beneath the top so you can rotate it while you work. lthough it has heavy-duty construction it is still light enough (10 lbs.) so that you can easily move it around when necessary

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars253 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
